game.name: An Altered State
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A psychological horror visual novel where your choices shape the mind of a teenager with schizophrenia as he investigates a murder at summer camp.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A psychological horror visual novel where your choices shape the mind of a teenager with schizophrenia as he investigates a murder at summer camp.
